SEAMM plug-in which provides loops in flowcharts.This plug-in provides looping control structures for flowcharts, likea `for loop` in a programming language.* Free software: BSD license* Documentation: https://molssi-seamm.github.io/loop_step/index.html* Code: https://github.com/molssi-seamm/loop_stepFeatures--------* Simple `for i = # to # by #` loops* `Foreach` loop over elements in a list* `For row` loop over rows in a table (see the `table plug-in`_).. _`table plug-in`: https://molssi-seamm.github.io/table_step/index.htmlAcknowledgements----------------This package was created
